meanings.definition: To eat less food than the body requires for proper functioning.
meanings.sent1: She tends to undereat, which can lead to health issues.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to undereat, as it can affect your energy levels.
meanings.sent3: John always forgets to eat lunch and ends up undereating, much to his stomach's dismay.
meanings.sent4: Her busy schedule causes her to undereat, leaving her feeling weak and tired.
meanings.sent5: Undereating can slow down your metabolism and make weight loss more difficult.

meanings.definition: To consume insufficient amounts of food.
meanings.sent1: When you undereat, your body may not get all the nutrients it needs.
meanings.sent2: It's important not to undereat, as it can impact your overall health.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater tended to undereat, much to the chef's frustration.
meanings.sent4: Undereating can leave you feeling hungry and irritable throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: If you undereat consistently, it can lead to nutritional deficiencies over time.
